menu.name: Gameplay
menu.desc: Change Gameplay options such as Downscroll, Scroll Speed, Naughtyness...

checkbox.name: Downscroll
checkbox.desc: If checked, notes will go from up to down instead of down to up, as if they're falling.

checkbox.name: Ghost Tapping
checkbox.desc: If unchecked, trying to hit any strum that have no note that can be hit will cause a miss.

checkbox.name: Naughtyness
checkbox.desc: If unchecked, will censor the Week 7 cutscenes

checkbox.name: Camera Zoom On Beat
checkbox.desc: If unchecked, will stop the camera from zooming in every 4 beats

menu.name: Appearance
menu.desc: Change Appearance options such as Flashing menus...

menu.name: Miscellaneous
menu.desc: Use this menu to reset save data or engine settings.
